mypage.unregisterNotice:
· Personal information will be deleted
  after unregister, and all data cannot be
  recovered.
mypage.unregisterNotice2:
· You will be removed from all ongoing
  chat rooms, and any groups you created
  will also be deleted.
mypage.agree: I have read all the information and agree to it.

register.terms: You must agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
register.passwordInvalid: Password must be 8-20 characters long and include numbers, letters, and special characters (@$#!%*?&).
register.nicknameInvalid: Nickname must be between 2 and 10 characters.
register.newPassword: Enter the new password to use.

The administrators will take appropriate action in accordance with Glomeet usage guidelines after review.
